CREATE TABLE characters (
	character_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	character_name VARVHAR ( 255 ) NOT NULL,
	user_id integer REFERENCES users(user_id) ON DELETE SET NULL
);


-- DDL generated by Postico 1.5.3
-- Not all database features are supported. Do not use for backup.

-- Table Definition ----------------------------------------------

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id integer,
    route_name character varying(250),
    location_id integer REFERENCES locations(store_id),
    user_id integer REFERENCES users(id),
    reasons text,
    route_order integer,
    CONSTRAINT routes_pkey PRIMARY KEY (route_id, location_id)
);

-- Indices -------------------------------------------------------

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX routes_pkey ON routes(route_id int4_ops,location_id int4_ops);
